cmmc-compliance-tool.content: A comprehensive tool for assessing and tracking CMMC 2.0 compliance across organizational systems. Features automated scanning, gap analysis, and executive reporting.

nitrousos.content: nitrousOS is a specialized Linux distribution built on NixOS, designed to be modular, secure, and versatile. It targets three distinct use cases: desktop computing, server deployment, and network infrastructure management.

sections.heading: System Variants
list: **Oxide** - Minimal server base for production deployments

sections.heading: Key Features
list: **Security by Default** - LUKS2 full-disk encryption for root, home, and swap partitions
**Modular Architecture** - Plugin system allowing users to enable only what they need
**GPU Management** - Dynamic switching between integrated and discrete graphics
**Reproducible Builds** - Leverages Nix Flakes for consistent, reproducible system configurations

sections.heading: Desktop Environments
sections.content: Four desktop environment options are available:

sections.heading: Platform Support
sections.content: Builds available for multiple deployment targets:

crypto-pool-party.content: A network infrastructure participating in the Cardano blockchain as nodes within the PARTY pool. The system employs cloud technologies to maintain failover capabilities and redundancy across US East and West Coast locations.

sections.heading: About Cardano
sections.content: Cardano is a decentralized blockchain and cryptocurrency project that is fully open source. Its governance involves three organizations: the Cardano Foundation (independent standards body), IOHK (development company), and EMURGO (commercial ventures).

sections.heading: Infrastructure
list: Multiple relay nodes across geographic regions

pentalpha194-website.content: An informational site for Pentalpha Lodge #194, built as a static website. The project demonstrates a modern automated publishing workflow where code changes trigger automatic generation and deployment.

sections.heading: Features
list: Static site generation for fast performance

jmweeks-website.content: This website serves as an online portfolio and information hub. Its purpose is to highlight projects, provide background information, and serve as a repository of things that are useful or may be useful to others.

portfolio-website.content: A responsive photography portfolio built with Hugo static site generator and Tailwind CSS. Features lazy loading, lightbox galleries, and optimized image delivery.

security-audit.content: A comprehensive security audit framework for assessing network vulnerabilities, compliance gaps, and security posture.

documentation-site.content: A comprehensive documentation portal featuring full-text search, version switching, and interactive API examples.

embedded-controller.content: Custom firmware for an ESP32-based environmental monitoring system. Collects temperature, humidity, and air quality data with MQTT transmission.

inventory-system.content: A full-stack inventory management system featuring barcode scanning, real-time stock levels, and automated reorder notifications.

data-pipeline.content: A robust ETL pipeline processing millions of records daily with data validation, transformation, and warehouse loading.

mobile-app-landing.content: A high-converting landing page for a fitness tracking mobile app, featuring animated sections, testimonials, and app store integration.

automation-scripts.content: A suite of automation scripts for CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure provisioning, and system administration tasks.

legacy-migration.content: A phased migration project converting a 30-year-old COBOL mainframe system to a modern microservices architecture.
